flavorText:
"You're in luck. I brought enough to share."
—Chandra Nalaar

foreignData.flavorText: „Du hast Glück. Ich kann ein paar abgeben."—Chandra Nalaar
foreignData.name: Flammen des Hitzkopfs
foreignData.text: Flammen des Hitzkopfs fügt 3 Schadenspunkte zu, deren Aufteilung auf ein, zwei oder drei Ziele deiner Wahl, die Kreaturen und/oder Spieler sein können, du bestimmst.

foreignData.flavorText: "Tienes suerte. Traigo suficiente como para compartir."—Chandra Nalaar
foreignData.name: Llamas de la instigadora
foreignData.text: Las Llamas de la instigadora hacen 3 puntos de daño divididos como elijas entre una, dos o tres criaturas y/o jugadores objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: « Vous avez de la chance. Je suis partageuse. »—Chandra Nalaàr
foreignData.name: Flammes du brandon
foreignData.text: Les Flammes du brandon infligent 3 blessures réparties de la manière que vous choisissez entre une, deux ou trois cibles, créatures et/ou joueurs.

foreignData.flavorText: "Sei fortunato. Ne ho portato abbastanza da condividere."—Chandra Nalaar
foreignData.name: Fiamme del Tizzone Ardente
foreignData.text: Le Fiamme del Tizzone Ardente infliggono 3 danni suddivisi a tua scelta tra una, due o tre creature e/o giocatori bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 「あんたは幸せよ。私のものを分けてあげる。」――チャンドラ・ナラー
foreignData.name: 炬火の炎
foreignData.text: クリーチャーやプレイヤーを、１つまたは望む組み合わせで２つか３つ対象とする。炬火の炎はそれらに、３点のダメージをあなたの好きなように分割して与える。

foreignData.flavorText: "운이 좋군. 나눠 줄 만큼 많이 가져왔거든."—찬드라 날라르
foreignData.name: 선동가의 불길
foreignData.text: 생물과 플레이어 중에서 하나, 둘, 또는 세개의 목표를 정한다. 선동가의 불길은 그 목표들에게 피해 3점을 당신이 분배한 대로 입힌다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Você está com sorte. Eu trouxe o suficiente para compartilhar."— Chandra Nalaar
foreignData.name: Chamas da Instigadora
foreignData.text: Chamas da Instigadora causa 3 pontos de dano distribuídos à sua escolha entre uma, duas ou três criaturas e/ou jogadores alvo.

foreignData.name: Пламя Разжигательницы
foreignData.text: Пламя Разжигательницы наносит 3 повреждения, разделенные по вашему выбору между одним, двумя или тремя целевыми существами и (или) игроками.

foreignData.flavorText: 「你走好运啦。我带来的够大家享用。」～茜卓纳拉
foreignData.name: 惹事人烈焰
foreignData.text: 惹事人烈焰对一个，两个，或三个目标生物和／或牌手造成共3点伤害，你可以任意分配。

foreignData.flavorText: 「你走好運啦。我帶來的夠大家享用。」～茜卓納拉
foreignData.name: 惹事人烈焰
foreignData.text: 惹事人烈焰對一個，兩個，或三個目標生物和／或玩家造成共3點傷害，你可以任意分配。

name: Flames of the Firebrand
originalText: Flames of the Firebrand deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.

rulings.text: You divide the damage as you cast Flames of the Firebrand, not as it resolves. Each target must be assigned at least 1 damage. (In other words, as you put the spell on the stack, you choose whether to have it deal 3 damage to a single target, 2 damage to one target and 1 damage to another target, or 1 damage to each of three targets.)

text: Flames of the Firebrand deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.
